thread.section_title: Solopress Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.solopress.com | 14 of 450
thread.title: Neil Abrahams

author: Neil Abrahams
title: Neil Abrahams
text:
My order has now been received.
I am so impressed with your service!
I couldn't have expected such a fast turnaround time receiving the order on my doorstop within 48 hours of placing the order.
Your quality is exactly the same as my previous longterm reliable printer, except you were less than half their price.
Your web based ordering system took a while to navigate round and place my order, but that was still more cost and time effective than the alternative.
I will be sorry not to continue to support my local printing company, but the difference makes it a no-brainer.
Well done. I will happily recommended you to other friends and community organisations.
Neil
